title: Mina Masjid
review: This masjid is very old and the structure of the masjid is also made in olden style it is religious place.

title: One more
review: So many masjids and Dargah we saw in Agra, i cant seem to keep count of them. the mughals made on wherever they stayed, much like the hindu's would make a temple even in a tree. but all in all its all fun to see

title: SMALL MOSQUE
review: It is a small mosque built by Shah Jahan for his own and his selected royal ladies. It is made up of white marble and is situated in the southwest of the Diwan-i-Khas.It has a small open court in front of the three arched prayer Chamber. The court is paved with alternate squares of marble and Jasper slabs.The structure is plain and simple and secured on all sides by lofty walls, which indicate its use by royal ladies.
